name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert HESS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert HESS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed, 270 Pa. Super. 501, 411 A.2d 830, as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Peter J. Verderame, Langhorne (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, First Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1011
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert HESS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 27, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Peter J. Verderame, Langhorne (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, First Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
